page.title: 10AGRICULTURE AROUND BROMYARD
page.content: Mr Manzoni,the owner of{Woolner {Hill Farm ,Avenbury},farms 66 acres of land,20 of which contain{wheat}.The remainder is divided between{grassland and{arable crops:typical of this area. As well as{bullock store cattle},he runs a{fat lamb production unit}which consists of 100{Suffolk}and{Suffolk {cross}ewes. Heavy reliance on the vet,for medical supplies,is necessary for controlling pests and diseases on the livestock.Contractors supply chemicals needed for the welfare of the crops. Being such a small farm,the machinery is limited.However,it is efficient enough to maintain productive land. The{main}daily duty is feeding the livestock in the{morning}and the {evening.}The livestock needs little attention during the summer months.
